name: Minecraft Server
short_description: Dockerized Minecraft server with easy configuration and mod support.
description: This is a Docker image that makes hosting a Minecraft server easy. It supports Vanilla, Spigot, Paper, Fabric, and Forge modded servers. Features include one-command deployment, automatic startup and crash recovery, easy mod installation, backup functionality, dynamic memory allocation via environment variables, RCON for remote management, and support for multiple server types. Perfect for hosting a private game for friends or family, or running a small community server.
usecases: Host a private Minecraft server for friends and family.
Run a modded server with Fabric or Forge.
Run multiple Minecraft versions with different containers.
Automate backups of your world data.
notes: Set EULA=true to accept Minecraft EULA
Memory allocated via MEMORY environment variable
Supports Vanilla, Spigot, Paper, Fabric, Forge
